content: Interestingly, because of what you’ve been going through and what you just shared, your words have even more meaning then before. You’re right, it was G.O.D. that put us here talking. There’s no other explanation that makes any sense. Take a look: Threads & Ripplesgloriouspublication.com I’m dealing with being a helper for people grieving the same loss as you. Two of which are under the age of 13 and the other is their father, Mr. Cyborg. If I can help you via words over the internets, it seems the task of helping them while here with them physically every day is likely not as impossible as I thought. Thank you for sharing more. It helped me, Paul Reney. Hugs, -nem 🌺
